info.name: Cursor 4 the Web - DT | WINDOWS/APPLE
info.description:
This is Style is created by Dave Tucker.
The cursor is designed for Windows/Apple and looks like a middle finger.

The cursor has seen all pages!
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0 (BETA) - the corresponding cursor has changed
v1.1 - small improvement
v2.0 - the cursor works on more pages
v2.1 - the cursor is now contant
v3.0 - the cursor works on all pages
